segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, everything seems so ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's apron and dress make her look like a classic homemaker.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh no, the faucet is on and the sink is overflowing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading down the cabinets; that's going to ruin them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious, just polishing that plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the childrenâ€” that boy on the stool is way too high up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble right down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is egging him on, reaching for her share of cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel so anxious watching this; someone needs to intervene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's growing, and her foot is soaked through her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is serene, bushes neatly trimmed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This contrast makes the inside mess even more alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't hear the water sloshing before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
